name: 曾恕銘
objective:
1.有限場
2.線性區塊碼
3.迴旋碼
4.格子編碼調變
5.渦輪碼
schedule:
ECC1 Introduction
ECC2 Convolutional codes/Viterbi Equalization
ECC3 Parallel Concatenated convolutional codes
ECC4 Low density parity check codes
ECC5 Space time codes (including hybrid)
ECC6 Reed-Solomon codes and related concatenated schemes
ECC7 Turbo decoding/detection
ECC8 Cyclic and CRC codes
ECC9 Trellis coded modulation
ECC10 Layer 2-ARQ and multiple access protocols
